name: Whyalla Foreshore Motor Inn

reviews.text: We were on business and had dinner at the Watersedge Restuarant one night. The food and the service were excellent so we had dinner there again the very next night.
reviews.title: Excellent food at the Watersedge Restaurant

reviews.text: So when we had to stay in Whyalla we stayed at the Whyalla Foreshore Motor Inn. The rooms are slightly dated, but still very comfortable. The shower was also an older style, so actually gave a great shower!
reviews.title: Great service, excellent location!

reviews.text: Again the food and service was excellent at the Watersedge restuarant. We will return!!
reviews.title: Plain. But probably the best in its area. Not exactly spoilt for choice here..

reviews.text: Pretty basic accommodation, but best in the area. Nice and quiet. Awesome location right on the foreshore. The restaurant is great, very tasty food and a lot of choice! Staff were very kind and helpful and always a smile on their face. Great accommodation choice!
reviews.title: Excellent Service!

aka: Whyalla Foreshore Motor Inn South Australia
